4Suite™ API Documentation

► Module Ft.Lib.number

Functions:
finite, isinf, isnan
Globals:
inf, nan

Functions

finite(number)
finite(number) -> non-zero if neither infinite or not-a-number
isinf(number)
isinf(number) -> -1 if negative infinity, 1 if positive infinity, 0 otherwise
isnan(number)
isnan(number) -> non-zero if not-a-number

Globals

inf = inf
nan = nan
